original: 正史中幾無記載。為袁術部將，曹操征討袁術時，袁術棄軍逃走，留橋蕤、李豐、梁綱、樂就等人殿後。兵敗後，李豐為曹操所斬。
text: There are few records in official history. When Cao Cao conquered Yuan Shu for Yuan Shubu, Yuan Shu abandoned his army and fled, leaving Qiaoluo, Li Feng, Liang Gang, Lejiu and others behind. After the defeat, Li Feng was cut by Cao Cao.
